content: Second Half_1, Miami, Martinez, 1 (penalty kick), 59th minute; 2, Miami, Martinez, 2 (Yedlin), 75th; 3, Atlanta, Gutman, 1 (Lennon), 90th+2.Goalies_Atlanta, Quentin Westberg, Clement Diop Degoud; Miami, Drake Callender, Nick Marsman.Yellow Cards_Cremaschi, Miami, 24th; Lennon, Atlanta, 48th; Ruiz, Miami, 72nd; Sanchez, Atlanta, 75th; Callender, Miami, 90th+9.Red Cards_Negri, Miami, 84th.Referee_Armando Villarreal.
